name: basic beanie
notes:
**this pattern includes instructions for four different yarn weights: fingering, dk, worsted and bulky.**

would you like to receive special discounts, free patterns and other knitting-related tidbits? sign up for my [newsletter][1]!

--------------------------------------------------------------

not too tall and not too snug, just a quick, simple and cozy hat.

*skill level*
easy / beginner

*sizes*
s (m, l) to fit head circumference 19-20 (21-22, 23-24) inches / 48.5-51 (53-56, 58-61) cm

*finished circumference (approx. unstretched)*
16 (18, 20) inches / 40.5 (45.75, 51) cm around hem

*finished length* 
7¾ (8½, 9¼) in / 19.5 (21.5, 23.5) cm

*gauge*
**fingering:** 26 sts and 40 rnds to 4”/10cm on us size 3 (3.25mm) needles in stockinette stitch
**dk:** 21sts and 30 rows to 4”/10cm on us size 6 (4mm) needles in stockinette stitch
**worsted:** 18sts and 26 rows to 4”/10cm on us size 7 (4.5mm) needles in stockinette stitch
**bulky:** 12sts and 16 rows to 4”/10cm on us size 11 (8mm) needles in stockinette stitch

*skills necessary*
knitting, purling, decreasing, casting on

*yarn requirements*
**fingering:** 170 (190, 210) yds / 155 (175, 195) m of fingering weight yarn
**dk:** 140 (155, 170) yds / 130 (145, 155) m of dk weight yarn
**worsted:** 120 (135, 150) yds / 110 (125, 140) m of worsted weight yarn
**bulky:** 95 (100, 110) yds / 90 (95, 105) m of bulky weight yarn

*suggested yarn*
**fingering:** 1 (1, 1) 1.75oz/50g ball drops flora (65% wool, 35% alpaca, 230 yds/210 m) in 05 “dark grey”
**dk:** 2 (2, 2) 1.75oz/50g balls drops lima (65% wool, 35% alpaca, 109 yds/100 m) in 9015 “grey”
**worsted:** 2 (2, 3) 1.75oz/50g balls drops alaska (100% wool,  76.5 yds/70 m) in 63 “pearl grey mix”
**bulky:** 2 (2, 3) 1.75oz/50g balls drops snow (100% wool, 54 yds/50 m) in 01 “off white”

*needles*
**fingering:**
16” circular needle in us size 1 (2.25mm) and us size 3 (3.25mm) (or needle size to obtain gauge) 
double pointed needles in us size 3 (3.25mm)
**dk:**
16” circular needle in us size 3 (3.25mm) and us size 6 (4mm) (or needle size to obtain gauge) 
double pointed needles in us size 6 (4mm)
**worsted:**
16” circular needle in us size 5 (3.75mm) and us size 7 (4.5mm) (or needle size to obtain gauge)
double pointed needles in us size 7 (4.5mm)
**bulky:**
16” circular needle in us size 10 (6mm) and us size 11 (8mm) (or needle size to obtain gauge)
double pointed needles in us size 11 (8mm)

*notions*
tapestry needle, scissors, stitch markers, measuring tape

© cleome smith
